typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		PersonID as integer,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		Address as string,
		City as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from [WideWorldImporters].[dbo].[Persons1];',
	format: 'query') ~> source
source rank(asc(FirstName, true),
	output(PersonID as long),
	dense: true) ~> Rank1
